blogPost.excerpt: Fishy Products by Adflow is the only GPT-3 copy generation tool that helps you prepare your April Fools' stunt. Our interface is a tribute to the original Mac OS from 1984 (inspired by poolside.fm). ⠀ The AI tool is completely free, no sign-up required!
blogPost.body: Fishy Products by Adflow is the only GPT-3 copy generation tool that helps you prepare your April Fools' stunt. Our interface is a tribute to the original Mac OS from 1984 (inspired by poolside.fm). ⠀ The AI tool is completely free, no sign-up required!
blogPost.title: Fishy Products by Adflow.ai - Generate April Fools' marketing product ideas with AI
blogPost.author: Francesco Signoretti

localize.description: Fishy Products by Adflow是唯一一款GPT-3拷贝生成工具，帮你准备好愚人节的特技。我们的界面是向1984年的原版Mac OS致敬（灵感来自poolside.fm）。⠀该AI工具完全免费，无需注册!
localize.tagline: 用AI生成愚人节营销产品创意

localize.description: Fishy Products by Adflow是唯一一款GPT-3拷貝生成工具，幫你準備好愚人節的特技。我們的界面是向1984年的原版Mac OS致敬（靈感來自poolside.fm）。⠀該AI工具完全免費，無需註冊!
localize.tagline: 用AI生成愚人節營銷產品創意

previous.excerpt: What if programming was about ideas, not semicolons? Compose, abstract, generalise. Start from top down or bottom up and refine as you go. With Nodes, programming feels like sketching on a canvas.
previous.title: Nodes - Thinking space for exploring ideas with code

localize.description: 如果编程是关于思想，而不是分号呢？组成、抽象、概括。从自上而下或自下而上开始，边走边完善。有了 Nodes，编程感觉就像在画布上画草图。
localize.tagline: 用代码探索思想的思维空间

localize.description: 如果編程是關於思想，而不是分號呢？組成、抽象、概括。從自上而下或自下而上開始，邊走邊完善。有了 Nodes，編程感覺就像在畫布上畫草圖。
localize.tagline: 用代碼探索思想的思維空間

next.excerpt: Waving is a gamified social network, targeted for gen-z, we have the coolest features of other traditional social media but we added some sparks of gamification!!! Every action you make is converted to coins and you can change for new features and more range.
next.title: Waving - Gamified social network

localize.description: 挥手是一个游戏化的社交网络，定位于gen-z，我们拥有其他传统社交媒体最酷的功能，但我们加入了一些游戏化的火花!!! 你的每一个动作都会被转换成金币，你可以换取新的功能和更多的范围。
揮手是一個遊戲化的社交網絡，定位於gen-z，我們擁有其他傳統社交媒體最酷的功能，但我們加入了一些遊戲化的火花!!! 你的每一個動作都會被轉換成金幣，你可以換取新的功能和更多的範圍。
